publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5149 Karen Gillon: Congratulations to the Carluke and Lanark Gazette—That the Parliament congratulates the Carluke and Lanark Gazette on its 100th birthday; notes that the paper is still based at its traditional home at 3 High Street, Carluke, where it was established by Andrew Beveridge in 1906; recognises the contribution made by the paper, now part of Johnston Press plc, to the local communities of Clydesdale, and thanks the staff team and, in particular, the local correspondents who ensure the Gazette’s ability to reach into the heart of every community within its circulation area. Supported by: Donald Gorrie*, Derek Brownlee*, Eleanor Scott*, Colin Fox*

S2M-5149 Congratulations to the Carluke and Lanark Gazette (lodged on 14 November 2006) Mr Jamie Stone*, John Swinburne*, Mrs Mary Mulligan*, Jackie Baillie*, Cathie Craigie*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Christine Grahame*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Michael McMahon*, Sarah Boyack*
S2M-5149 Congratulations to the Carluke and Lanark Gazette (lodged on 14 November 2006) Trish Godman*, Chris Ballance*

S2M-5149 Karen Gillon: Congratulations to the Carluke and Lanark Gazette—That the Parliament congratulates the Carluke and Lanark Gazette on its 100th birthday; notes that the paper is still based at its traditional home at 3 High Street, Carluke, where it was established by Andrew Beveridge in 1906; recognises the contribution made by the paper, now part of Johnston Press plc, to the local communities of Clydesdale, and thanks the staff team and, in particular, the local correspondents who ensure the Gazette’s ability to reach into the heart of every community within its circulation area. Supported by: Donald Gorrie, Derek Brownlee, Eleanor Scott, Colin Fox, Mr Jamie Stone, John Swinburne, Mrs Mary Mulligan, Jackie Baillie, Cathie Craigie, Dr Elaine Murray, Christine Grahame, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Michael McMahon, Sarah Boyack, Trish Godman, Chris Ballance
S2M-5149 Congratulations to the Carluke and Lanark Gazette (lodged on 14 November 2006) Maureen Macmillan*, Cathy Peattie*
S2M-5149 Congratulations to the Carluke and Lanark Gazette (lodged on 14 November 2006) Nora Radcliffe*
